channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频 在巴米扬省的山坡上，选手们轮番从雪山上飞驰而下，尽管失去了赞助商和在 2021 年塔利班接管阿富汗后离开该国的著名滑雪运动员，但他们仍团结一致，使滑雪运动在阿富汗得以继续🇦🇫 ⛷️。
item.description:
VIDEO Slopeside in Bamiyan province, rivals cheer each other on as they take turns racing down the snowy mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan despite the loss of sponsors and prominent skiers who left the country after the 2021 Taliban takeover
🇦🇫 ⛷️ pic.twitter.com/RMvOHTa0QZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: #塞内加尔反对派领导人松科和法耶获释：律师
item.description:

item.title: 卫冕冠军卡洛斯-阿尔卡拉斯在印第安维尔斯站四分之一决赛中对阵亚历山大-兹维列夫的比赛周四突然中断，因为蜂群将球员们赶出了体育场球场🎾 🐝 ⤵️。
item.description:
Very bee-zarre.
Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz's quarter-final clash with Alexander Zverev at Indian Wells was halted abruptly Thursday as swarming bees drove the players from Stadium Court
🎾 🐝 ⤵️https://t.co/zMIykPUbAR pic.twitter.com/hytly5VrDK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四，利物浦在 14 分钟内连进四球，以 6-1 的比分大胜布拉格斯巴达，晋级欧洲联赛四分之一决赛，德甲领头羊拜耳勒沃库森在补时阶段连进两球，淘汰卡拉巴赫 ⤵️。
item.description:
⚽Liverpool scored four times inside 14 minutes in a 6-1 thrashing of Sparta Prague on Thursday to reach the quarter-finals of the Europa League, as Bundesliga leaders Bayer Leverkusen needed two stoppage-time goals to eliminate Qarabag ⤵️https://t.co/Nvx3ACbxdY pic.twitter.com/Zn1La7eYBw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）周四参观了一家堕胎诊所，强调了生殖权利这一关键的选举议题，据信这是美国总统或副总统首次进行此类访问🇺🇸。
item.description:
US Vice President Kamala Harris toured an abortion clinic Thursday, highlighting the key election issue of reproductive rights in what is believed to be the first such visit by a president or vice president
🇺🇸 https://t.co/VfQr61hMFL pic.twitter.com/FQ4nCMdQ2g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: Ratadoobie？新奥尔良警方在收缴大麻时，无法阻止警局总部内的一些人吸食没收的大麻。他们遇到麻烦的不是警察，而是在大楼里出没多年的老鼠🇺🇸 🌿 🐀
item.description:
Ratadoobie? As New Orleans police seize marijuana, they can't stop some inside department headquarters from consuming the confiscated stash. It's not officers they're having trouble with, but rather rats that have infested the building for years
🇺🇸 🌿 🐀 https://t.co/lNkeW8KzF9 pic.twitter.com/4AZUIgobTk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯卫生部称以色列向等待援助的加沙人开火造成 11 人死亡
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas health ministry says Israeli fire on Gazans waiting for aid kills 11 pic.twitter.com/TP1khHUyKJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频 在美国众议院通过一项法案，迫使视频分享应用程序 TikTok 与其中国母公司断绝关系，否则将在美国被禁止使用之后，华盛顿和北京之间爆发了一场争论 🇺🇸 🇨🇳 #AFPTV
item.description:
VIDEO A spat has erupted between Washington and Beijing after the US House of Representatives passed a bill that would force video-sharing app TikTok to sever ties with its Chinese parent company or be banned in the United States
🇺🇸 🇨🇳 #AFPTV pic.twitter.com/ZjE6KxzOgz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：巴勒斯坦人在加沙北部拜特拉希耶争相领取飞机空投的援助物资，严峻的人道主义危机已将加沙地带大部分地区推向饥饿的边缘 @AFPTV
item.description:
VIDEO Palestinians rush to collect aid airdropped by a plane in Beit Lahia, in northern Gaza, amid a gruelling humanitarian crisis that has pushed much of the strip to the brink of starvation @AFPTV pic.twitter.com/SslCbNbpgY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：缅甸现在是世界上最大的海洛因生产国，对于冲突和政变频发的缅甸的许多农民来说，种植罂粟已成为他们在社会和经济动荡中维持生计的唯一途径。提取的鸦片树脂被提炼成海洛因，销往世界市场📹🇲🇲。
item.description:
VIDEO For many farmers in conflict- and coup-riven Myanmar, now the world's biggest heroin producer, poppy farming has become their only way of making ends meet amid social and economic turmoil. The extracted opium resin is refined into heroin destined for the world market
📹 🇲🇲 pic.twitter.com/cxLmUiYMXi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 斯普林布克队后卫埃本-埃策贝斯（Eben Etzebeth）被评为 2023 年南非年度最佳橄榄球运动员，斯普林布克队在这一年成功卫冕世界杯冠军。这位 32 岁的球员连续第二年获此殊荣 🇿🇦 🏉 ⤵️
item.description:
Springbok lock Eben Etzebeth has been named South Africa's Rugby Player of the Year for 2023 – a year in which the Springboks successfully defended their World Cup title. The 32-year-old won the award for the second year in a row 🇿🇦 🏉 ⤵️https://t.co/bLeMkQuOsS pic.twitter.com/VQX7AA3G7h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四，政治家们继续举行重要会谈，旨在组建一个临时管理机构，以拯救因帮派肆虐和暴力🇭🇹 而陷入法律和秩序崩溃的海地。
item.description:
Politicians pressed on Thursday with crucial talks aimed at forming an interim governing body to rescue Haiti from a breakdown in law and order sparked by rampaging gangs and violence
🇭🇹 https://t.co/9Vmp6itJ0v pic.twitter.com/aGPz2wiEb4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周四表示，他反对将美国钢铁公司出售给日本新日铁（Nippon Steel）公司的提议，因为选举年的考虑似乎超过了激怒重要盟友日本的风险@dannyctkemp & @beiyis report🇺🇸 🇯🇵
item.description:
President Joe Biden said Thursday he is against the proposed sale of US Steel to Japan's Nippon Steel, as election year considerations appeared to outweigh the risk of angering key ally Japan@dannyctkemp & @beiyis report
🇺🇸 🇯🇵 https://t.co/V170usNl3R pic.twitter.com/gG16dlpoQ3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 法新社周四看到的联合国调查报告显示，以色列坦克10月份炮击黎巴嫩记者，造成1死6伤，在此之前 "没有交火"🇮🇱 🇱🇧 ➡️
item.description:
A United Nations investigation found there was 'no exchange of fire' before an Israeli tank shelled journalists in Lebanon in October, killing one and wounding six, its report seen by AFP on Thursday showed
🇮🇱 🇱🇧 ➡️ https://t.co/us4KWjCeUs pic.twitter.com/fYvS2bVyFE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 援助组织 SOS Mediterranee 周四援引获救者的说法称，一艘移民船在试图从利比亚驶往欧洲途中失去动力，船上至少有 60 人死亡。已有220多人从不同的船只上获救➡️。
item.description:
At least 60 people died on a migrant boat that lost power as it tried to reach Europe from Libya, aid group SOS Mediterranee said Thursday, citing accounts from those rescued. More than 220 people have been rescued from different boats
➡️ https://t.co/5ltCNCASDy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

Efforts mounted on Thursday to get more aid into the war-devastated Gaza Strip, where the UN warns of famine and desperate residents have stormed relief convoys ➡️ https://t.co/4m6cMLm2Qh pic.twitter.com/AqMaOZDPI1

item.title: 埃弗顿后卫贾拉德-布兰斯韦特和纽卡斯尔边锋安东尼-戈登周四首次被征召入英格兰队，参加与巴西和比利时的友谊赛 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Everton defender Jarrad Branthwaite and Newcastle winger Anthony Gordon received their first call-ups to the England squad on Thursday for friendlies against Brazil and Belgium ➡️ https://t.co/q7BlPfCLpG #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/RlEBldVtTI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频： 🇺🇸 TikTok首席执行官敦促美国应用程序用户在投票后畅所欲言寿子秋（Shou Zi Chew）敦促美国的TikTok用户分享他们的故事，因为众议院通过了一项法案，如果TikTok不从中国母公司字节跳动（ByteDance）分离出来，就可能禁止该应用程序。#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇸 TikTok CEO urges US app users to speak out after vote

Shou Zi Chew has urged TikTok users in the US to share their stories after the House of Representatives passed a bill which could ban the app if it does not split from Chinese parent company ByteDance.#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/kswhCplYvw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：雷宾-皮什蒂万（Rebin Pishtiwan）蜷缩在一辆面包车的后座上，仔细地扫描着一页又一页泛黄的纸张，这是库尔德斯坦艺术与文化中心（KCAC）发起的一个项目的一部分，该项目旨在将有可能永远消失的库尔德历史文献数字化。
item.description:
VIDEO: Huddled in the back of a van, Rebin Pishtiwan carefully scans one yellowed page after another, as part of a project launched by the Kurdistan Centre for Art and Culture (KCAC) to digitise historic Kurdish texts at risk of disappearing forever. pic.twitter.com/cdmnhVZwgx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 什么是甲烷？⚠️ @IEA称，化石燃料行业的排放量在2023年升至接近历史最高水平。🏭 它说，如果石油和天然气公司兑现其气候承诺，就可以减少这些排放量➡️。
item.description:
🌍 What is methane?
⚠️ Emissions by the fossil fuel industry rose to near record highs in 2023, the @IEA says.
🏭 It says oil and gas firms can slash these emissions if they deliver on their climate promises
➡️ https://t.co/Q9GzBHY7U1 pic.twitter.com/pNCBCIq8Wd

— EU Data News Hub🇪🇺 (@EUDataNewsHub) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：3 月 11 日，瑞典气候活动人士格丽塔-图恩伯格（Greta Thunberg）与其他活动人士一起堵住了瑞典议会的入口，她说："全球气候大罢工已经过去五年了，我们感觉有点像破了的唱片。
item.description:
VIDEO: "It's five years since the global climate strike, and we feel a bit like broken records," says Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg as she blocks an entrance to the Swedish Parliament on March 11, along with other campaigners. pic.twitter.com/J2Zciav9z8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 🌍 什么是甲烷，甲烷如何导致 #气候变化？⚠️ @IEA表示，化石燃料行业的排放量在2023年上升到接近历史最高水平。🏭 它表示，如果石油和天然气公司兑现其气候承诺，就可以减少这些排放量➡️。
item.description:
🌍 What is methane and how does it contribute to #climatechange?
⚠️ Emissions by the fossil fuel industry rose to near record highs in 2023, the @IEA says.
🏭 It says oil and gas firms can slash these emissions if they deliver on their climate promises
➡️ https://t.co/Q9GzBHYFJz pic.twitter.com/TdTClfzjju

— EU Data News Hub🇪🇺 (@EUDataNewsHub) March 14, 2024

item.title: 对津巴布韦的一些儿童来说，在上学路上遇到大象或鬣狗并不是什么稀奇事。去年，该国有 50 人被野生动物咬死。
item.description:
Running into elephants or hyenas on the way to school is not an unusual experience for some children in Zimbabwe.

Wild animals killed 50 people in the country last year.

Authorities have come up with an unconventional solution: bicycleshttps://t.co/4hh4tGRAL6 pic.twitter.com/rEIsIY5y9A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024
